title: Goose
overview: Chris Gosling is small-time criminal who develops an addiction to theft. As he spirals out of control, Chris must decide how far he is willing to go in order to prolong the high generated by his kleptomania.

title: Saavdhan
overview: After a series of online thefts, Ayush leaves on the trail to find the culprit. He gets more into it, after it effects one of his friends.

title: Under
overview: An up and coming detective is determined to solve a case that has been left open for a decade. He will soon find out the real reason the case has never been solved.

title: Joggers
overview: On his way home, a young man exchanges glances with an attractive woman he sees jogging on his street. He decides on a plan to 'run into her' again on the following day with the hopes of sparking up something romantic.

title: No Apparent Reason
overview: A short, dialogue-less mise en scène about a college student facing the harsh and brutal reality of humanity.

title: The Horse Head Incident
overview: Joey? Horse Head? Too many questions, not enough answers. A mob boss interrogates one of her own to find answers.

title: Watchlist
overview: "Watchlist" is a short film written, directed and starring channel creator AJZ with a cast and crew of local and University of New Hampshire students. Andrew Grey is a young man struggling with anger issues and deeply despises injustice in the world. Finding a new outlet for his rage in vigilantism, he patrols the city streets at night in a mask and tactical suit. Is Andrew's alternate persona, Watchlist, simply a product of pain and trauma or is he truly making a difference in the high crime Queen City?

title: Youth, Youth
overview: Still a schoolboy, 18-year-old Yinchen has trouble finding life in a city he doesn’t belong to. Friendship grows on the streets until, one night, his friend KK draws him into a precarious business.

title: Astoria
overview: Three years after a traumatic event that changed her life Kelly, a young girl, returns to her hometown Kastoria and to her friends whom she has left behind. At the same time, a curious case of a hit-and-run accident, that had shaken the town, is opened once again.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

title: Moon Beams
overview: While on the run after killing a cop, drug dealer Harry runs into his former flame, Maxine, after three years apart. The two were partners in crime and abusive heroin addicts until they separated and have both grown formatively since they last saw each other. Maxine clings to the rebellious lifestyle she was synonymous for and chastises Harry for growing up to accept the "system" - completely unaware that he is on the lam. Their night spent together consists of catching up, musing on life's societal norms as they come of age, and how maybe they ended their relationship too soon.

title: The Scream
overview: Director Meqdad Al-Kout explores the details of a day in the life of a depressed young man in Kuwait.

title: Chasing Shadows
overview: In the gritty world of underground dealings, 'Chasing Shadows' follows the story of a mysterious man for hire who operates from the wheel of his iconic Camaro. Tasked with a routine pickup by his enigmatic boss, he encounters a sudden twist when the dealer he meets doesn't match the picture provided. A dangerous cat-and-mouse chase ensues, leading to a deadly showdown.
tagline: In a game of deception, every shadow hides a secret.

title: Joy
overview: Rachel escaped her abusive ex only to find there’s plenty more to fear on the open road when she picks up a strange hitchhiking woman.
tagline: You Never Know Who You'll Run Into...

title: Skin Circuit
overview: A private investigator hunts for the kindappers of his best friend, runs into an underground crime organization.

title: El-Ezzba
overview: The story of two criminal teenagers in Giza, Egypt. They try to escape with a stolen money safe from an abandon house in thier neighborhood. And everything goes wrong.
tagline: ONE SAFE, TWO THIEVES AND A DRUG ADDICT.

title: Drive 2 Palermo: European Journey
overview: After the events of Drive to Palermo, our heroes are shattered. The presumed death of John Zeitler has left the team without its founding member. With no choice but to move forward, the group sets out for Palermo, Italy, in an attempt to root out Palermo's evil at its source.

production_companies.name: Peter Griffin Movies Company Corp. Inc.

title: Pour le pire
overview: In France in 2019, 146 women were killed by their partners or ex-partners. Three cases shed a chilling light on the mechanisms of feminicide.

title: R. Kelly: A Faking It Special
overview: Idol on stage. Monster off-stage. R&B superstar R. Kelly was a serial sex offender who secretly targeted underage victims for more than two decades. Experts pinpoint the tell-tale signs of a predator.
tagline: Idol on stage. Monster off-stage. A superstar's dark secrets exposed.

title: Catching a Serial Killer: Bruce McArthur
overview: Bruce McArthur was many things: friend, grandfather, mall Santa, landscaper - and a ruthless serial killer. He lived a double life: his wholesome appearance and cooperative nature eluded cops for years while he engaged in a hedonistic lifestyle filled with violent sex that often went too far. Through exclusive interviews with McArthur's close friends and the homicide investigators who cracked the case and expert analyses by leading criminologists and forensic psychologists, this two-hour special uncovers how McArthur targeted, terrorized and murdered members of Toronto's LGBTQ+ community, The Village, for nearly a decade before getting caught.

title: Out of Bounds
overview: Travis Elliot, a star high school basketball player from Memphis, Tennessee must save his older brother but is torn between playing the sport that he loves or living a life of crime.
tagline: You and Me We're A Team In This.

title: En farlig forbindelse: Mødtes på Snapchat
Blood Books
overview: A man goes to visit one of the gangster Boss' about a mystery killer out to kill every gang Boss.

title: Hood Baby
overview: Jay is pulled back into a lifestyle he no longer wants to live shortly after moving to a new city. After a business associate unknowingly brings an undercover into their operation, Jay resorts to unfamiliar tactics that come at a cost to everyone.

title: Out for Delivery
overview: A delivery man working at a pizza place moonlighting as a savior service for sex workers in danger and distress begins to question the work he does and who he does it for after rescuing a young girl that reminds him of his old self.

title: Tales From the Crip 3
overview: A gangster's loyalty to his street gang is tested after circumstances turn deadly in this compelling do-or-die saga from the streets.

title: I, Jeff Bartels, Is Uncovering Largest Scam Ever In NYS
overview: Long Island hero, Jeff Bartels, confronts local police department to uncover the largest scam ever in the state of New York.
tagline: "... you go to hell you scum bags."

title: The Green Force
overview: Ex-army chief created a secret Force to save the nation from Terror attacks. GREEN FORCE is an unofficial team of Patriots which fight against every terrorist activities.

title: Bigger Trouble in Lil Oakland
overview: When a thug returns to the streets of Oakland, there is a mark on his life as he now has to escape the Jamaican drug lord that wants him dead in a gritty crime thriller starring Bay Area Rappers.

title: Rostov
overview: The film comprises of an intense psychological experiment which was undertaken by students of a local acting college. The results were unsettling and genuinely disturbing.

title: The Crusade of Felipe Espinosa
overview: Set in 1860's Colorado, two Hispanic fugitives remain elusive after murdering dozens of Anglo-Americans -- a lifestyle rooted in the aftermath of a recent culture clash. Decades of ill-treatment against their heritage and families is their fuel for a bloody rebellion. Inspired by true events.

title: Getaway
overview: A getaway goes wrong and it's a battle for survival between the unlikeliness of people.

title: Hawala
overview: A underworld gangster based action movie which revolves around main 2 characters, one named Muscal Bhai, is a 9 killer by profession and the other one named Naama a local goon living on hafta vasool and local rowdism who is ambitious to become a don one day... These 2 characters meet and become friends who later on get involved in hawala business and attract rivalry with a don by name Rana who is ruthless... What happens next is the climax of the movie.

title: Night Surfers
overview: Two young men play a game of chance and fate as a night of egos skyrocket into something life changing.
tagline: These So Called Car Thieves Now Have A Nickname...

title: Study for a Feature Film
overview: Digitised celluloid cut together, reformed, corrupted, mutated, a conservative film becomes reframed, a high school girl begins a spiral into addiction in a nightmarish country.

title: The Retreat of the Turtledove and the Honey Badger
overview: After reaching a point of no return, Turtledove and Honey Badger are forced to discuss running away together.
tagline: It's just me and you against whatever, huh?

title: Cinder Blocks
overview: A getaway driver is forced by a detective to catch incriminating conversation from the crew that raised him, in order to gain a lighter sentence for himself.

title: Hunting Season
overview: Nikos, a low-key man, works as an assistant accountant in an insurance company that is facing financial problems. The main accountant of the company and his superior, Mr. Alexandridis, is a demanding and rude man, who takes advantage of Nikos and his slavery. When one night, Nikos accidentally sees two men threatening Mr. Alexandrides on the street, the balance in Nikos' life changes.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

title: Bridge Pooper
overview: A Local Detective is sent in to investigate a local criminal who happens to poo off of bridges
tagline: CRIME NOIR TAKEN TO IT'S CHEAPEST AND GOOFIEST LEVEL

title: Granny's Revenge
overview: Maria murders her husband and then tries to claim the life she hasn't experienced up to this point.

title: Los Alamos
overview: A fugitive Air Force general kidnaps a famous movie actress.

title: Unstockholm
overview: A kidnapping gone really wrong

title: Inside ROYGBIZ
overview: A documentary crew investigates a tech startup and witnesses its employees sanity or lack thereof.

title: Dhrukkonam
overview: A point of view between two guys on good and evil. The situation arises when one of the three guys going somewhere in the car has a gun and a situation that made him have that gun. Changes the story to a new turn.

title: Lens
overview: A security guard is confronted with a moral dilemma.

title: Hard Ride
overview: Three war veterans on a motorcycle ride come into conflict with bikers and gangsters. The bikers want their girl back, the gangsters their drugs. This leads to an all out war with the bikers and gangsters up against three highly trained veterans.
tagline: Life is a hard ride... you only live once.

title: I Had a Great Time Last Night
overview: Two down-on-their-luck stoners execute a bank heist when one realizes he went on a date with the teller the night before.

title: This Town Ain't Big Enough for the Both of Us
overview: Two rival pickpockets clash in an increasingly risky game of cat-&-mouse.

title: Ihsan: The Movie
overview: The harrowing true story of Ihsan, a young man struggling in Gotham City

title: Imperfect
overview: Last letter from a serial killer in distopic Istanbul...

title: Sahosh
overview: There are rivers on both sides of Bagerhat and forest behind. Life is as whimsical as nature, and the storms are endless. Amid all that chaos, Neela-Raihan's love story wants to blossom. Then the storm hits hard, and their life turns upside down, but they don't give up. They gather courage and keep fighting hard.

title: A Callgirl for Ghosts
overview: The film is part of Lemkes never-ending Munich series, but this time it leads beyond Schwabing or Maxvorstadt, which makes it more entertaining than its predecessors. After a stop at the Bayrischer Hof, it moves into the Glockenbachviertel, over the Reichenbachbrücke to the Isar, further into the suburbs. These places are not alien to residents of Munich or tourists, but Lemke knows no tour guide romance. He has the usual group of main characters, two or three girls, a young man, and sends them off as if on a great expedition. They bring along the Lemkestyle, which doesn't fit in anywhere, but works like a contrast medium. Their fantasy figures make the reality around them more real.

title: Cerré los ojos y me hablaron las hormigas
overview: Francisco is a beggar who lives in the Almudena cemetery. One afternoon, while walking among the graves, he meets Julio, another peculiar beggar who claims to be a poet.
tagline: A story from Spain's crime chronicles

title: Three Hundred Million
overview: Soo-rim, an aspiring writer who is in debt, Jong-hoon, a police captain who is worried about his new baby, and Woo-min, an ordinary office worker who is preparing to marry his girlfriend and open a cafe. The three of them need money for their own reasons, and when they rashly apply for a clinical trial, they find themselves in a situation they never imagined, and their lives take an unexpected turn.

title: Call It Fate, Call It Karma
overview: A vengeance-fuelled restaurant owner attempts to take revenge on his backstabbing employee. However, when confronted, things go terribly wrong.

title: Dead Beats
overview: Two slimy hood rats receive a suspicious briefcase, their task? get the case and themselves out of the projects.
tagline: No Two Trappers Are equal, Cousin

title: Missing
overview: Daniel's son "Brian" has an aggressive embolism attack that has him admitted into the ICU; the only way Daniel can save him is to sell a house that doesn't belong to him with the hope the owners default on their loan payment that's due in 3 days. When the owner of the house "Tom" shows up that evening Daniel has him kidnapped to force a default but the kidnap goes horribly wrong and Tom ends up dead.
tagline: How far will you go to for the ones you love.

overview: In the gripping action thriller '240' John Doe, a hardened hitman, finds himself entangled in a web of danger and deception. Be immersed into a high-stakes narrative where every moment counts. As John's calculated skills lead him to unwittingly target the son of a formidable crime lord, he's thrust into a deadly game of survival and redemption. With heart-pounding sequences and unexpected alliances, '240' will propell you on an electrifying journey of suspense and adrenaline.
tagline: Betrayal, Bullets, and a Desperate Race Against Time

title: Reminiscing Shadows
overview: Memphis homicide detective, Danielle, leads the country in closed cases. Her partner Aaron, is new to the homicide department. The two are tasked with their toughest case involving a mysterious masked group causing mass murders.

title: Idle Girl
overview: Music, Mystery and...Christmas? Idle Girl; a punk rock Christmas crime story of a woman with something to hide and a man who is curious to know more. Will she be able to keep her secrets and keep him safe?
tagline: A punk rock Christmas crime story of a woman with something to hide and a man who is curious to know more. Will she be able to keep her secrets and keep him safe?

title: Party Time
overview: Two party clowns plan a daring heist of a Princess Diana Beanie Baby from a dockside quinceanera/satanic summoning ritual.

title: I love you mum, I promise I won't die
overview: In May 2014, just months after Dan died, the DSM Foundation commissioned award-winning playwright Mark Wheeller to write a verbatim play that told his story, so other young people could learn the lessons he sadly no longer could, and make choices that would keep them safe. The title takes Dan’s joking last words to his mum, Fiona, before he left home for what turned out to be the last time: ‘I Love You, Mum – I Promise I Won’t Die’. Mark worked on the very first production with his talented youth theatre company in Southampton, Oasis Youth Theatre, and the play had its first public performances in March 2016, with previews in Southampton and its premiere at the BRIT school, just a mile from Dan’s home in Croydon, South London.
tagline: I love you mum, I promise I won't die

title: Ruby Red Pony
overview: In a criminal ridden suburb, it's hard to keep secrets. But you remember one of the most important rules of organized crime? No witnesses. Stupidity meets coincidence in this short action comedy.

title: Obsidian Meltdown Presents: Seals Of Refusal
overview: Craig's journey continues as he teams up with Fatty to kick ass and take names.

title: Wait Until the Morning
overview: Pandemonium erupts after four high school students discover their math teacher's dead body and turn into self-styled detectives.

title: Coyote
overview: A smuggler's past catches up with him during a fateful encounter in a quiet countryside diner...

title: Madaari
overview: Set in the political turmoil of Karachi in 2008, Haris Qadeer hasn't had an easy life since his father was murdered in a political riff. The cut throat city doesn't help him financially or emotionally. The only luck he gets is at his father's killer's office. What would he choose? Revenge or a  better life?

title: The Flock
overview: While on a journey to find a mysterious cult, three young people encounter a plot to raise a demonic entity. Hot on their trail is a team of mercenaries with a similarly mysterious background, hellbent on taking down anyone involved.

title: Right Hand Man
overview: Artis Baranovskis is a "registrator". He helps his clients by setting up fake companies. An hour before leaving to his own wedding, Artis has to find Jana, who's a fake shareholder of a company with a million euros on its account. Once she's found and her looks changed to those of a rich lady, Jana realizes her power and starts to play her own game. "Right Hand Man" is a crime comedy about money, accounts and troublesome thieves.

title: Green Between The Lines
overview: A young, kind-hearted drug dealer is forced to prove himself.
tagline: The Kind of Green that would make you risk it all

title: Hindi Hinihintay Ang Kalayaan
overview: At a mass mobilization and an impending protest, a mysterious woman stands in front of the crowd as a concluding speaker. She retells a popular creative article written by an anonymous journalist under the pen name “Maya Malaya”, a metaphoric story featuring a group of warriors longing for emancipation. As the article unfolds, we follow the story of three siblings bound by their tragic past but separated in different paths.
tagline: THE FIGHT FOR FREEDOM AND JUSTICE DOESN’T END INSIDE THE FOUR CORNERS OF THE ROOM.

title: Buried In The Backyard
overview: When younger, Isabela buried a revolver in the backyard, with a promise to take revenge on her stepfather, who assaulted her mother.  Years later she digs up the gun and goes in search of revenge.

title: Sweet Revenge
overview: Gianna will never forget the day she witnessed her father being killed by a gangster name Curtis as a little girl. Now grown up, fate intervenes, and Gianna finds Curtis back in her life. She meets Detective Corey but he doesn't know her past and gets caught up after his wife dies by the gun from Curtis boys. Now the Detective has to be by Gianna's side and fight!

title: Fruits of Labor
overview: A failing street fruit vendor finds himself at odds with a thief looking to start the same business illegitimately.
tagline: WHEN LIFE HANDS YOU LEMONS, FIGHT.

title: You're Now Beyond Hope, Arizona
overview: An ominous alcoholic is in town to collect a debt when he unexpectedly encounters a magnetic AA sponsor.

title: Absolution, Parsin
overview: The imagined perpetrator in a famously unsolved true-crime case, “Who Put Bella Down the Wych Elm”, is confronted about his past by an unearthly Bison in this Stop-Motion animated short film.

title: The Case Died With Her
overview: In this harrowing special, legal commentator and former prosecutor Loni Coombs dives into the shocking case of Emilie Morris, a young woman in her 30s who met a tragic and untimely death days before she was due to appear in court regarding her charges against Jim Wilder for sexually inappropriate behavior she had experienced as a minor.

title: Kadavulukku Oru Kaditham
overview: Pinky, an orphan misses her parents, writes a letter to god requesting him to send them back so that she can spend time with them. Unfortunately, that letter falls in the hands of the local gangster, whose leader comes up with a plan to kidnap the girl for ransom.

title: Dollmaker: The Anatoly Moskvin Story
overview: The story of a disturbed Russian linguist who was arrested in 2011 after the mummified bodies of 26 girls and women were found in his apartment.

title: Lost
overview: Ranya is a young woman who finds herself at the center of a conspiracy, she has been «programmed» and manipulated by members of a mysterious organization, to serve as a lab rat in an experiment carried out by these people for a very specific purpose. A whole protocol was set up to shape her and create the desired character. Stripped of her life and souvenirs, with a confused memory and a suffocating present, Ranya decides to set off in search of her true life. A life lost in a plot to rule the world through the conditioning of high-ranking personalities. A well-crafted scheme to monitor, govern and rule.

title: Fatality
overview: Pasha and his mischievous friend Dan arrive from their provincial hometown to Moscow. Chasing a dream of a whole new adult life, they get to meet the city crew of graffiti writers. Being inspired by the coolest street artist of the city, Pasha starts naively dreaming of becoming a part of his crew. For the sake of achieving the goal, he's ready to make it as far as possible.

title: The Uncle
overview: The story of the series revolves around a mafia man named Ayham Aref, who is having difficulty managing his personal life with his family and the criminal organization in which he works and heads.

title: Good Grief It's Friday
overview: A former Bay City cop tries to keep his failing P. I. business alive, and his loyal assistant employed, by finding and returning a piece of very expensive jewelry for a fabulously wealthy and beautiful client. She's the first client he's had in a long time but Philip discovers that there is far more to her story than she told him. Most puzzling of all, the police don't want him to follow this case or the suspicious circumstances surrounding the death of his late wife. The deeper he goes into this case, the clearer it becomes that everyone with whom he comes in contact has a secret.

title: Grade Point Assassin
overview: A psychotic couple seeks vengeance for their low grades.
tagline: I think that we should stab him in the neck!

title: My side of the story
overview: All star football player Michael Smith is a victim who is wrongfully accused and becomes the perpetrator.

title: The Wrong Spot
overview: The right day and the right time, but the wrong spot.

title: Chaval
overview: Pablo, a young man from the neighborhood, is late at night with his friend Néstor. They both wait for the van to pick them up. In the meantime, Paul's mother keeps calling him back home.
